title: STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string starts with any of the specified compare_strings(case-insensitive); otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: â€¦ compare_strings
parameters.description: Strings to compare against the start of the source string. case-insensitive.

examples:
IF(STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE(Product_type__c, "icu"), "Medical", "Technical")
-- Checks whether the value in the Product_type__c field starts with "icu", ignoring case.
-- Returns "Medical" if it does; otherwise, returns "Technical".
-- Useful for categorizing product types based on prefix patterns regardless of letter casing.

tips.text: An empty compare_string always returns TRUE since every string starts with an empty string.
Punctuation and symbols are treated like letters.
